ace_zero.test_flight_control module¶

Tests for the Platform class.

class ace_zero.test_flight_control.TestFlightControl(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Test the basic commands for the platform dynamics model. Each tests issues a command, ticks the platform model a number of steps and then asserts to see if the platform model is in the desired state. Additionally, a call to draw_platform_trace is made to generate a plot of the trajectory of the platform during the test.

classmethod setUpClass()[source]¶

Common initialisation data for all the tests.

test_climb()[source]¶

Tests the ability of the platform model to climb to the desired altitude. Issues an altitude_cmd with a desired altitude and pitch angle.

test_heading_change()[source]¶
